original_text: And Jesus, full of the Holy Spirit, returned from the Jordan and was led by the Spirit in the wilderness
korean_text: 예수께서 성령의 충만함을 입어 요단 강에서 돌아오사 광야에서 사십 일 동안 성령에게 이끌리시며

sentences.original_text: And Jesus, full of the Holy Spirit, returned from the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 성령으로 가득 찬 예수께서 요단에서 돌아오시고

sentences.original_text: and was led by the Spirit in the wilderness
